/** [userCenterMapper.xml][com.adminproject.banner.service.impl.userCenterMapper.selectUserCenter][고객센터 조회] **/
SELECT BNO as serNum, BNONAME as serId, BNOTITLE as serTitle, BNOCONTENT as serContent, BNODAY as serDay, BNOVIEWS as serViews FROM ( select a.*, ROWNUM as rnum from ( select * FROM usercenter
where BNONAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BNOTITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BNOCONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNONAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNOTITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNOCONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by BNO ASC ) a) where rnum >#{startList} and rnum <=#{listSize}*#{page}

/** [userCenterMapper.xml][co.kr.airplane.service.impl.userCenterMapper.selectUserCenterListCount][회원정보 수] **/
select count(*) from usercenter
where BNONAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BNOTITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BNOCONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNONAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNOTITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BNOCONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
